sentences.en: Concrete is composed of cement, sand and gravel mixed with water.
sentences.cn: 混凝土由水泥 、 砂、石子与水掺和而构成.

sentences.en: He appeared very composed despite the stress he was under.
sentences.cn: 尽管压力很大，他看起来仍十分镇定。

sentences.en: I still can't trust myself to remain composed in their presence.
sentences.cn: 我仍然不放心自己能否在他们面前保持镇静。

sentences.en: It wasn't the peaceful, composed experience I had expected.
sentences.cn: 这并不是我所期待的那种祥和平静的体验。

sentences.en: Laura was very calm and composed.
Our class is composed of eighteen boys and twelve girls.
sentences.cn: 我们班由18个男生和12个女生组成.

sentences.en: Pictures should be in focus, with realistic colours and well composed groups.
sentences.cn: 照片应该图像清晰，颜色逼真，构图合理。

sentences.en: She quickly composed herself as the car started off.
sentences.cn: 车一上路，她就很快让自己平静了下来。

sentences.en: The cell is the unit of which all living organisms are composed.
sentences.cn: 细胞是构成一切生物的单位。

sentences.en: The character " 王 " is composed of one vertical and three horizontal strokes.
sentences.cn: “王 ” 字的写法是三横一竖.

sentences.en: The houses in my hometown were chiefly composed of wood.
sentences.cn: 我家乡的房子过去多由木料制成.

sentences.en: The melody that ran through his brain was composed of bad notes.
sentences.cn: 回荡在他脑海里的旋律都走调了。

sentences.en: The sea water is mainly composed of water and salt.
sentences.cn: 海水主要由水和盐组成.

sentences.en: The south garden at Sissinghurst was composed symmetrically.
sentences.cn: 锡辛赫斯特南面花园的布局工整对称。

sentences.en: The tune was composed at the beginning of the War of Liberation.
sentences.cn: 这支曲子是在解放战争初期谱写的.

sentences.en: Though badly frightened, she remained outwardly composed.
sentences.cn: 她虽然非常害怕，但表面上依然很镇静。

sentences.en: Vivaldi composed a large number of very fine concertos.
sentences.cn: 维瓦尔第创作了很多非常优美的协奏曲。

words.tran_cn: 作曲家；作家，著作者；设计者
作文，作曲；[材] 构成；合成物
构成；写作；使平静；排…的版

trans.tran_en: If someone is composed, they are calm and able to control their feelings

trans.tran_cn: 组成( compose的过去式和过去分词 )，调解，[印刷]排（字），使安定
